description: Days before his bodybuilding competition, Calvin came to my house to shoot his very first Maskurbate unmasked scene. The timing was perfect! Calvin's body was astonishing and even though he felt a bit weak, he was in a great mood. He talked about his sacrifices and discipline in order to reach his goals and even gives some advice to young bodybuilders.Hard to keep your hands off such a work of art, so I convinced him to let me worship his muscles before he started stroking his big cock.I've shot a lot of scenes since 2006, but I feel this one is special, as is Calvin.
title: Calvin Unmasked, Scene #01
